name: Adventures of Potato Jeffery
description:
- How to play:

    - Controls:

        - WASD

        - ^<>\/ (arrow keys)  to move

        - space bar can jump

    - What to do:

        - you start with three lives witch are raspberry pi's logo

        - gold coins are give you 100 points

           silver coins give yo 50 points

          and copper coins give you 25 points

        - Potato Jeffery must get to his girlfriend on the end of the level

       - avoid the red blocks, the spikes and the bottom of the level that'll kill you all.
